001package org.consensusj.daemon.micronaut;
002
003import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.BlockChainInfo;
004import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.BlockInfo;
005import io.micronaut.context.annotation.Context;
006import io.micronaut.http.MediaType;
007import io.micronaut.http.annotation.Controller;
008import io.micronaut.http.annotation.Get;
009import io.micronaut.http.annotation.PathVariable;
010import org.bitcoinj.base.Sha256Hash;
011import org.consensusj.bitcoin.services.WalletAppKitService;
012import org.slf4j.Logger;
013import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
014
015import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
016
017
018/**
019 * Embryonic implementation of Bitcoin Core REST API. Incomplete and incorrect at this point.
020 */
021@Controller("/rest")
022@Context
023public class BitcoinRestController {
024    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(BitcoinRestController.class);
025    private final WalletAppKitService walletAppKitService;
026
027    public BitcoinRestController(WalletAppKitService walletAppKitService) {
028        log.info("Constructing JsonRpcController");
029        this.walletAppKitService = walletAppKitService;
030    }
031
032    @Get(uri="/block/{hash}.json", produces = MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
033    public CompletableFuture<BlockInfo> block(@PathVariable String hash) {
034        log.info("chaininfo REST GET call");
035        return walletAppKitService.getBlockInfo(Sha256Hash.wrap(hash), BlockInfo.IncludeTxFlag.YES);
036    }
037
038    @Get(uri="/block/notxdetails/{hash}.json", produces = MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
039    public CompletableFuture<BlockInfo> blockNoTxDetails(@PathVariable String hash) {
040        log.info("chaininfo REST GET call");
041        return walletAppKitService.getBlockInfo(Sha256Hash.wrap(hash),  BlockInfo.IncludeTxFlag.IDONLY);
042    }
043
044    @Get("/chaininfo.json")
045    public CompletableFuture<BlockChainInfo> chaininfo() {
046        log.info("chaininfo REST GET call");
047        return walletAppKitService.getblockchaininfo();
048    }
049
050}
